tasks.name: weeklyAverage util
tasks.prompt:
Create js/weeklyAverage.js with a pure ES module:
export function weeklyAverage(weights){ if(!weights.length) return 0; const s=weights.reduce((a,b)=>a+b,0); return Math.round((s/weights.length)*10)/10; }
